name: Save Matt
description:
Save Matt is a non gravity Physics Puzzle with Sci-Fi Detective story line!

Matt is in trouble again! During his mission to colonize the planet 44 in the Andromeda galaxy, Matt has lost his course! Before the communication breakdown it was evident that his ship was sailing through asteroid belt. On board there are 50 passengers including scientists, military personal, civilians and other crew members. We have dispatched a rescue mission, a ship called SpaceRanger1. To reach captain Matt will be dangerous and extremely difficult as he was separated and is drifting the furthest in space! However we still know he is alive?Your mission is to reach him while saving the other 49 passengers. The top priority is to save captain Matt in order so we can find out what really happened on board of the ship!
